org.dejave.attica.storage
Class StorageManager

java.lang.Object
  org.dejave.attica.storage.StorageManager

public class StorageManager
extends java.lang.Object

StorageManager: The storage manager of attica. Provides low-level page I/O to the rest of the system.

Author:
sviglas
